title: Companies With the Most Jobs in This Region
textBeforeTable: Capital RegionCounties: Albany, Columbia, Greene, Rensselaer, Saratoga, Schenectady, Warren, and Washington July 2015 Current Job Openings View videos that offer information and advice to job seekers, including about an electronic job-matching technology tool known as SMART. Take our short survey now about your social media and technology use to help improve our programs.   Post Jobs Here Below are current job openings in New York's 10 regional economies. New Yorkers can view the region they live in, see which industries are growing and find out what jobs are available in that economic sector. Job opening numbers are updated frequently.
